column6: Purchased 2 units within 2 weeks of each other - both had problems
column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
column14: Look.... I did what everyone else probably did here, searched for dash cams, organized by product reviews, and came across this very reasonably priced unit that not only included a backup camera, but also a SD card. Figured, "Hey, this is it! Exactly what I wanted!"

column6: Another dash cam that gets it wrong
column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
column14: Got this on sale since my other dash cam stopped working after a year.  What all these positive reviews neglect to tell you is this is another cheap dash cam that doesn't have the settings it should have.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
column14: Camera rear view doesn't work, main camera freezes and won't shut off. A $10 product listed for $50. Prepare to be disappointed.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2021
column14: I was able to plug this in and use it immediately for a trip across the country. I then hid all the wires later.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2021
column14: Had for just over three months, days after the return window ended on Amazon.... Doesn't even recognize there is a rear camera.  No change to use or anything with the vehicle it was installed in.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2021
column14: Installed it 2 weeks ago, worked great until today.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2021
column14: The first trip went great. Saved both front and rear videos and super easy to use. The next time I used it the camera would power on then immediately turn off. If I unplugged the rear camera the camera stayed on but the buttons stopped working and it would not record automatically. Super glad I wasted two hours installing this just to have it glitch out. Not recommended.

column6: Died at 5 months.  Controls are not intuitive.  Written instructions are almost useless.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2021
column14: After only 5 months of operation, it will power up; run for ~2 minutes; and shut down.  Basically, it's a dead guy.
